citations.narrative:
Space. Insufficient space was being provided to three weanling enclosures. Weanling enclosures each measure 24
inches wide by 78 inches long or 1872 square inches of floor space. The top enclosure was housing 64 male weanlings,
the middle enclosure was housing 64 female weanlings, and the bottom enclosure was housing 128 weanlings. Weanling
guinea pigs weighing up to 350 grams require at least 60 inches of floor space each. Can not house more than 31 guinea
pig weanlings in this size enclosure.
Insufficient space can cause stress and aggression in animals which can result in bites, scratches, ear chewing, and other
injuries and health problems. Licensee must ensure that guinea pigs are provided with at least the minimum amount of
floor space per animal to prevent overcrowding, stress, and aggression.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.28(c)(1)(iii)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
Space. Insufficient space was being provided to three weanling enclosures. Weanling enclosures each measure 24 
inches wide by 78 inches long or 1872 square inches of floor space. The top enclosure was housing 64 male weanlings, 
the middle enclosure was housing 64 female weanlings, and the bottom enclosure was housing 128 weanlings. Weanling 
guinea pigs weighing up to 350 grams require at least 60 inches of floor space each. Can not house more than 31 guinea 
pig weanlings in this size enclosure. 
 
Insufficient space can cause stress and aggression in animals which can result in bites, scratches, ear chewing, and other 
injuries and health problems. Licensee must ensure that guinea pigs are provided with at least the minimum amount of 
floor space per animal to prevent overcrowding, stress, and aggression. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
